page.title: 07Youth Groups in Collingham
page.content: Two{cub}packs meet every week and two{ {brownie}packs.There is also a{scout} pack and a{guide}pack.The cub hut came from Cottam Power Station and the youth groups had to raise Â£800 to have the foundations put in.Extensions also had to be built on. The{dancing club }is held at the Youth and Community centre.It has about 50 members. The{youth club }meets on Tuesday and Friday.They play games and also have snooker and table tennis.Trips are organised every year to places of interest and to go ice skating at Nottingham Ice Rink. The Wesley Room is used for playgroup, guild and Sunday school.{Playgroup }is held every week during term time for children under 5 years of age.A charge of 85p per session is made to cover costs.
